<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.client_transaction" name="Client Transaction Timings" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" help="Client_Transaction_Timings_Plugin" cache_flush="true">
<description>The Client Transaction plugin provides support to track client rendering times at the server, lining the values up with the server transaction times</description>
<extension point="com.glide.monitor" name="ClientNetworkTimes" class="com.glide.client_transaction.ClientNetworkTimes"/> <extension point="com.glide.monitor" name="ClientBrowserTimes" class="com.glide.client_transaction.ClientBrowserTimes"/>
</plugin>
]]></definition> <description>The Client Transaction plugin provides support to track client rendering times at the server, lining the values up with the server transaction times</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Client_Transaction_Timings_Plugin</help> <id>com.glide.client_transaction</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Client Transaction Timings</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.client_transaction/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires/> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.client_transaction</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
